data.title: R.L. Lipton Distributing Co
data.text:
Since 1909, every drop of Shiner Beer has been brewed at the Spoetzl Brewery in Shiner, Texas (population 2,069).

Today, our little brewery sends more than 6 million cases of delicious Shiner beer to states across the country.

We think our founder, Kosmos Spoetzl, would be pretty proud.

SHINER BOCK

Brewed with rich, roasted barley malt and German specialty hops this lightly hopped American-style dark lager always goes down smooth. Originally a seasonal beer, fans have demanded it year-round since 1973. Growing to the top-selling craft beer in Texas it is truly the beer of Texas.

SHINER SEASONAL

Brewed with rich, roasted barley malt and German specialty hops this lightly hopped American-style dark lager always goes down smooth. Originally a seasonal beer, fans have demanded it year-round since 1973. Growing to the top-selling craft beer in Texas it is truly the beer of Texas.
